name: helpmissimo
title: Helpmissimo
author: notnotmelon
description: Pyanodons except you are trapped in a factorissimo. What could possibly go wrong? WARNING: This is an extreme brutal mode factorio mod designed to take 2000+ hours to complete. Comparable in difficulty to GregTech: New Horizions or Campaign for North Africa. Do not download this if you value your time.
